snippet: The Memphis defensive tackle is more difficult to project than just about any prospect in the draft. He could go in the top 12 selections or drop out of the first round altogether.
abstract: The Memphis defensive tackle is more difficult to project than just about any prospect in the draft. He could go in the top 12 selections or drop out of the first round altogether.

headline.main: Scouting the Draft: Memphis's Dontari Poe
